text.div:
Generated Narrative: CodeSystem contracttermsubtypecodes

Last updated: 2024-04-24 00:00:00+0000

Profile: Shareable CodeSystem

This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/contracttermsubtypecodes defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
condition ConditionTerms that go to the very root of a contract.
warranty WarrantyLess imperative than a condition, so the contract will survive a breach
innominate InnominateBreach of which might or might not go to the root of the contract depending upon the nature of the breach

name: ContractTermSubtypeCodes
title: Contract Term Subtype Codes
description: This value set includes sample Contract Term SubType codes.

concept.definition: Terms that go to the very root of a contract.
Less imperative than a condition, so the contract will survive a breach
Breach of which might or might not go to the root of the contract depending upon the nature of the breach
